lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a stay at home mom. I spend my time taking care of my 10 month old daughter and 2 year old son.

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to be able to be more independend
lender.occupational_info: i'm workin in a office organising fairs - in this moment a construction fair and we're creating a new special space for bath trends for wich i'm responsibel

lender.name: Michelle & Matt
lender.loan_because: we care. We believe that small businesses are more effective than large ones in protecting the interests of individuals and local communities.

lender.loan_because: Its not about the loaning but about helping others around the world take strides forward in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work a part-time and it doesn't pay much, but I know there are others who need it more than I do.

lender.name: Kiara
lender.loan_because: It's a duty!

lender.name: Nikhil
lender.loan_because: I believe there could not be anything better than helping someone who is willing to give his/her full efforts. I like people who amidst all troubles are willing to take step forward and optimistic about creating new solutions.
lender.occupational_info: I am working in a research labs for diagnosis of diseases

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a shot.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs, start-ups and global businesses implement successful online marketing strategies.

lender.name: FDL Team
lender.loan_because: We want to give back to other small business owners around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a global group of small business owners focusing on fashion and design.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of Pay It Forward - and with Kiva I can do it again and again for people I would never be able to access on my own.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people on how to manage, save, protect and invest their money.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I love paying it forward and appreciate all life has to offer. Since these loans can significantly improve families' lives, it pays rewards to all.
lender.occupational_info: I sell TV shows to cable networks in the US.

lender.name: Konstantin
lender.loan_because: My dad started a small business when we lived in Ukraine. I know that had he received a loan similar to the ones Kiva provides, he would have achieved even more than he did. Now, I can help people like my dad reach their dreams.

lender.name: Vintage Blue
lender.loan_because:
Vintage Blue strives to support people in all aspects of life in need and encourages people to make a positive change. We want to give our customers a say in which they want to support, so we have decided to let our customers donate 5% of their purchase to different organizations.
Vintage Blue believes and supports what KIVA is about and what it is doing for individuals in the developing world. We are honored to have the opportunity to offer to our customers the option to donate to KIVA
lender.occupational_info:
Vintage Blue is a vintage-inspired sportswear line for women that holds the exclusive license to the All American Girls Professional Baseball League, featured in the movie “A League of Their Own” starring Madonna and Tom Hanks. Vintage Blue considers itself a timeless brand that produces high quality garments using eco-friendly fabrics and dyes. The company has and will continue to pursue licensing opportunities and draw inspiration from various sports genres throughout the eras.
Not only does Vintage Blue produce chemical-free garments, but it is a sustainable company in all aspects using eco-friendly materials when creating items like line sheets/catalogues, hang tags and more.
Vintage Blue is a socially conscience company donating 5% of profits to various organizations, implementing an internship program which fosters self esteem and garners opportunity to grow with the company to motivated young women, and creating campaigns that encourages people to make a positive change.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: micro-lending is the best way devised to end poverty. I've found that in life if you want something to happen its best to do it yourself.
lender.occupational_info: Arduous and expensive...learning.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: We all need each other. We have to help each other. Peace is possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a newbie Teacher-Librarian at a brand new and beautiful high school! I am looking forward to watching my library and school grow, and to work with great kids! It is an honour and pleasure to teach the children of others.

lender.name: Robi
lender.loan_because: I love the stories!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that raises money to improve national park areas in the San Francisco Bay Area.

lender.name: Pennie
lender.loan_because: I don't need everything that I have and I want to share it with people that don't have what they need.

lender.name: Ian & Kate
lender.loan_because: It is easy, and because someone who already has an idea is just looking for that little push, to make it a reality
lender.occupational_info: I retired some time ago.

lender.name: Beacon Heights COB
lender.loan_because: At Beacon Heights, we believe Jesus Christ calls and empowers us to be servants in our community and world. We want to share in word and deed the Good News of God's love and care for all people.
lender.occupational_info: Our church is committed to working for peace in our city, nation and world.

lender.name: Mat & Karla
lender.loan_because: people less fortunate than us deserve a chance in life.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Its fun!
lender.occupational_info: I study music at an arts highschool. I hope to be a classical guitarist someday.

lender.loan_because: I can...
lender.occupational_info: I work with investors to help them make intelligent decisions.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: i love my 3 daughters and they make me want to do great things.

lender.name: Sara-Linnéa
lender.loan_because: Someone else might use my savings while I don't need them - they will do so much more good this way compared to just sitting in the bank.

lender.name: Lee-Ann Steenkamp
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ has blessed my life so abundantly - I HAVE to share it!! God bless!
lender.occupational_info: I work at Stellenbosch University's Accounting Department. I teach my students how to read and apply South Africa's Tax Legislation. And I encourage them to follow their God-given dreams and passions...

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: all the people who want to work and achieve their goals should get the chance to do so.

lender.name: Marisa
lender.occupational_info: I'm an accountant at a small IT firm that develops and manufactures electronic devices for network communications.

lender.name: Angelika + Lothar
lender.occupational_info: Pensioner

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: ... this little step I do may help someone to jump forward in life.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: My life is abundant and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I design decorative flags for people to display outside of their homes.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to be empowered and encourage economic development in poorer parts of the world. Loans are a covenant to ensure investment generates measurable economic growth over the repayment period, or serve to reward those who are able to generate consistent income by improving their quality of life. The gains made by someone receiving a loan are not gifts from the lender, but entirely earned by the borrower. The culture created by borrowing and carefully managing debt is constructive to development.
lender.occupational_info: I make games that are played using computers. I love to see people entertained -- no matter how good or bad life gets, there is always room to play games, to escape from their daily life for a time. I provide people with that opportunity.

lender.name: Wim Leers
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world :)

lender.name: Juggling Frogs
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: I am
lender.occupational_info: Online Concierge Service

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: it makes so much sense.... and besides it feels good to see other people succeed!

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It connects me with the world and helps make people self-sufficient. The stories are heart warming.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Satisfying...I feel fortunate to do what I like.

lender.name: Abby and Ashley James
lender.loan_because: Micro finance works.

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm lucky to have had access to a quality education and job opportunities and I hope to help others who may not have been so fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently teaching English in South Korea.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to see positive change and development in our world. Africa is my home and I am fully committed to the success of this continent. Charity begins at home!

lender.name: iris
lender.loan_because: i want give a little help

lender.name: Victoria (Vicki)
lender.loan_because: Tambien soy mujer de negocios con mis propias prestamos... Pues, como por cierto ayudo a mi familia y la comunidad cerca de mi, me siento ciudadana mundial y hay que ayudarnos a nosotras, no?
lender.occupational_info: Trabajo en hierbas que vienen de India y de los Estados Unidos. Principalmente hablo en frente de grupos en como vivir bien en el ritmo de los cosmos. Mucha gente aqui en las ciudades estadunidenses se han olvidado como vivir naturalmente. Yo les ayudo recordar como usando la educacion de Ayurveda que recibio y tambien lo que ha aprendido de mis familiares, la comunidad mundial que vive en mi ciudad, y de mi misma ser.

lender.loan_because: this is a perfect way to stimulate local initiatives all around the globe!

lender.loan_because: We are a committee of four people who conduct meetings periodically. Each member at these meetings proposes at least one candidate to whom to give a loan. The other three board members review the proposal and support requires unanimous consent.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: we should
lender.occupational_info: Managing IT projects

lender.occupational_info: I used to teach deaf children to read and write

lender.name: Jayson
lender.loan_because: I want to be a partner to brothers and sisters around the world. Together, we can make a better life and a better world!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank, but my passion is my relationship with a small church in San Jose, Costa Rica that is living the gospel in a very real way everyday.

lender.loan_because: I built up my business from scratch so I respect all these entrepreneurs and want to help those who have less than I.
lender.occupational_info: I am partner with my wife Joy in a small business designing and making printed circuit boards. I work in the technical department while Joy takes care of office management and finances.

lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and a caregiver.

lender.loan_because: The micro finance concept is the most successful way for the poor to work their own way out of poverty and to afford school for their children.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of letting people choose how to change their own lives.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for a large entertainment company's Internet site as a writer -- I write stories, polls, game copy, and whatever other text might be needed.
My husband is a musician and artist, and works for a company that makes microphones.

lender.name: Taube
lender.loan_because: It's exciting and fulfilling to try and help someone intent on improving his or her life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies in the State of Georgia to help them increase their international sales and markets.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredit loans are a great way to boost economic development, and a way to have a link to a person far from where I live.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Canadian government, in Aboriginal affairs.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Umapinemurphy
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed

lender.occupation: entrepreneur owner of Teine Phat Productions
lender.loan_because: I'm just starting my new business...in printing materials and having them sewn in bulks to sell at the swapmeets and churches.
lender.occupational_info: Alot of the Samoan churchs need uniforms for church, I've been helping alot of these churches in doing that by printing their logos on materials (fabrics) then having them sewn with manufacturers so I can give them a good deal. I love helping people and decided to make this into a business.

lender.name: Agung
lender.loan_because: God loves me and everyone on this earth very much. God is very generous and everything belongs to Him. I want to be a good steward of His money.
lender.occupational_info: I provide accounting service to Hedge Fund managers and the goal is to prevent fraud within the fund. Madoff's scam will not work if he hired third party service like my company. The goal is that investors can be confident that their money is invested properly.

lender.name: Miss Stacey
lender.loan_because: I have been helped, and I want to help others have better opportunities too.

lender.name: Sumi
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Innovation, business, and commerce will pave the way to world peace.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school children how to read, sing, and perform music.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading comprehension and effective writing skills to American sixteen year olds.

lender.name: Shauna
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in need and what it means to have someone's help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm training to be a family doctor.

lender.name: Francisco
lender.loan_because:
I need a loan person to person, I have serious problems with my Renting and a beautiful child of 5 years, I need the money to afford the move and the coupling of the new house, I have stable work and paypal account, but I do not have the means to achieve money in another way. is that there are even good-hearted people in this world, only hope that God guide someone to my request. I need 200 or 250 dollars.
Thanks
lender.occupational_info: Stable, working in an airline, not earn much but enough to live.

lender.name: Proficiency Systems
lender.loan_because: We want to support entrepreneurship and help individuals lead their way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Our company helps clients get the most from their processes, to better meet the needs of their customers and shareholders.

lender.name: KiMM!E
lender.loan_because: I'm too stingy to give it away.

lender.name: Theresa & Thomas
lender.loan_because: We believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: Theresa works with computers at a university. Thomas does many things, from massage therapy to painting houses.

lender.name: In Memory of Theo
lender.loan_because: We started this account on Aug 15, 2008 the day that would have been our son Theo's second birthday. He passed away on May 28, 2008. He was a beautiful and mighty baby who overcame many medical challenges. We want to keep his loving spirit alive by making the world a better place in small ways. We love you Theo.

lender.name: Sam and Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: We feel so lucky in life and we want to help other people feel the same way
lender.occupational_info: Sam - an environmental attorney that works to ensure the integrity of our nations water and Elizabeth - an elementary school teacher that molds young minds

lender.name: Jeff & Alice
lender.loan_because: It seems to us that the best way to help people is to help them succeed at what they are already doing. Let the direction of help come from them first. If they can walk, we'd like to help them run.
lender.occupational_info: Alice teaches children who are 5 to 6 years old. Jeff works at a bank (not Kiva related), helping with the forms required to lend money to our local farmers and businessmen.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to give back -- to be that light at the end of the tunnel for someone. We've all been there!

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: i want to help the people that have ambitions to better themselves and their way of living.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: everybody needs some help sometime.

lender.name: ness
lender.loan_because: i believe in the long term benefits (both economic and cultural) of microlending. i think microlending is an elegant and sustainable solution that helps the right people in the right ways.
lender.occupational_info: i (my company) helps other companies do better business by giving them better technology

lender.name: Ven.
lender.loan_because: At some time in all our lives, each of us needs help. At other times, when we ourselves are fortunate, we can in turn help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Buddhist nun who lectures and writes books on Buddhism.

lender.name: Andy

lender.occupational_info: Reiki Master & Healing Touch Alternative Medicine

lender.loan_because: It is easy and I know that the money is going directly to people that need and can use it to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: the world is an unjust place, with the distribution of wealth embarrassingly uneven. I want to help make it better, even if it's just a little at a time.
lender.occupational_info: My employer gives people medical treatment that they need in order to live. We use dialysis to clean their blood for them after their kidneys have failed and we save thousands of lives every day all across the United States.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: micro finance is an empowering and honouring way for people to move towards financial independence, and lending to people feels such a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor in innovative green and clean tech start-up companies addressing climate change, resource depletion and bio-diversity loss. I also offer hospitality on a beautiful old motor yacht.

lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I study the effects of normal aging on brain function and structure, particularly related to memory using various neuroimaging techniques.

lender.name: Tim and Cathy
lender.loan_because: We like to share what we can, when we can.
lender.occupational_info: Cathy helps young people get jobs. Tim helps business people meet and discuss ideas (conferencing).

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: it was a gift but I think it is a fab idea.

lender.name: Goff Advisory Fund
lender.loan_because: Like me, all people want to be happy and free from suffering. I hope this fund will make some small difference in both regards.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to outstanding and generous 8th graders from the American School in London.

lender.name: Hendrik
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: building webpages

lender.name: ldb
lender.loan_because: That's how we started.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: My purpose in life is to help people to heal and to achieve their dreams. I heal and I inspire.
lender.occupational_info: As a healer I channel light and love to help people achieve a balance in their life so healing can occurr. I believe any disease can be healed. As a life coach I inspire people to find their passion in life and achieve their dreams

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I do admire all your courage to start a business under such difficult circumstances. May it work out well, good luck to all of you!

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: The best investment we can make is in helping each other. Peace to all!
lender.occupational_info: Metrology is the science of measurement - I use high-tech equipment to measure manufactured parts to verify the parts are made to my company's specifications, which helps to ensure the integrity & quality of our product. I currently work in robotic automation, which is fascinating!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: J.C. told us to love our neighbors as we love ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and make new windows for my customers who own old houses.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: It might help people to improve their life. I like my job and if I can help someone to do what he likes while creating an activity, then I am happy with that.
lender.occupational_info: I like sailing and music and overall, I like living in this world.

lender.name: Friends of "Eckhard"
lender.loan_because: I use the amazon affiliate program profits from my 68 Mustang project website for KIVA entrepreneurs who are working in the transportation or repair service sector.
lender.occupational_info: My job is consulting public authorities. The Mustang is just a project for the weekends and helping to collect money for KIVA :-) Best regards from Germany!

lender.name: vikash
lender.loan_because: I am a pooar persion and i want to work with you therefor i want Loan
lender.occupational_info: through Internet and cellphone

lender.name: Sayaka Sawada
lender.occupation: Farming, translation, guest house, MSF log
lender.loan_because: I feel how fortunate and privileged I am to be born in this country, to receive education and lead a decent life - I have invested enough for myself and feel it is time at my age to make ROI to the society for what I have received to support people who are in less fortunate circumstances to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: involved with multi-tasks: translation, interpretation, sales & marketing, consulting, some writing, organizing events

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: microlending is the most direct way in which I feel I can make a difference in the life of fellow members of my species somewhere else on this precious planet. Specifically, I honor and celebrate those who have given me a chance by reaching out and extending a hand to others.
lender.occupational_info: By trade I am neuroscientist who studies the basic mechanisms of neurological disorders such as Parkinson's, and drug addiction. For as long as I remember, however, I have also been an activist for environmental issues. I spend a lot of my spare time working in environmental education where we have converted an old farmstead into a conservation and restoration area. We work with kids at local schools to teach them the value of natural resources and ways to use them in a sustainable fashion. We help the community raise vegetables locally, offer workshops in beekeeping, and facilitate a seed business for native prairie wildflowers.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Enabling others to make a positive change in their lives, giving someone hope and support, letting them know that they and their efforts matter in this world - even to someone thousands of miles away. Every voice should be heard and empowering people is the best way to make a difference. One life at a time, one success at a time. Everyone deserves a chance in life, and I would encourage everyone able to, to please "pay it forward" any way you can. It is what living on this planet is about and every good turn is rewarded by another - its just up to someone to kick up the first ripple.....

lender.name: Gareth
lender.loan_because: I would like to see an improvement in peoples quality of life.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: Becasue what ever we do to the least of the people that we do for Him.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now and visit the sick at there homes, and bring them the love of my church.

lender.name: Ursula
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate and happy. Therefore I want to share my privileges with others. Love and happiness for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I am selfemployed in my travel office. My work is to find vacationhomes, hotels, etc. on the beautiful island of Mallorca, which is part of Spain.

lender.name: Kiser Middle School
lender.loan_because: it gives us a chance to learn about,connect with, and give a helping hand to people from all parts of the world. This is our up-close lesson in globalization.
lender.occupational_info: We are students and teachers, parents and friends.

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: I am aware of the struggles of those in deep poverty, and want to reach out to those working to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer. I used to work in Public Accounting, and have worked as a musician.

lender.name: Wayne, Kate and Yasmin
lender.loan_because: It is great to see people helping themselves, so lending is a way to encourage self help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people and computers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People... are people.
lender.occupational_info: I learn and teach mathematics.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I know how much my loans mean to the people they help.
lender.occupational_info: I help to keep Facebook working.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have.
lender.occupational_info: Providing the opportunity, promotion, education and treatment to guide individuals toward health, happiness and well-being through traditional Chinese medicine modalities.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: People have helped me; I want to help others.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to give hard working honest people a chance to get ahead. I love that these loans are interest free and allow people to retain there dignity knowing that someone believes in them enough to make the money available to them not as a handout. I own my own company and work very hard to make it successful, I know sometimes hard work needs a little capital to make the success happen.
lender.occupational_info: I use the computer to design advertising brochures, manuals, art, postcards, company logos and letterheads.

lender.name: Malachi
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I love to help support individuals helping themselves, building their life, and taking care of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that builds wind energy projects in Spain, the US, UK and around the world. In my free time I also volunteer for Kiva translating Spanish language loans.

lender.name: Trevor Ivory
lender.loan_because: It is a great way of directly helping those less fortunate than me and my help is more than just aid, it offers people the opportunity to imrpove their lives and lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am the candidate for the Conservative Party for the parliamentary constituency of North Norfolk.

lender.name: Gary and Amanda
lender.loan_because: this is just an awesome thing to do, if you're able to give small loans. This is one great program.
lender.occupational_info: Sit behind a computer 5 days a week, maintaining and updating a few different Network screens. Sometimes calling hospitals to dispute bills our insureds' are receiving.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: women everywhere should support one another
lender.occupational_info: I write about food, restaurants, and people I know.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: There should be no poverty in this world. Every individual who has a motivation to help themselves, their families and communities ought to be helped to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with lots of people from different parts of the world.

lender.name: Steph & Derek
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power and intelligence of self determination en route to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: My wife helps build things and I teach people how to heal.

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have family support in times of need and I want to give a little in return.
lender.occupational_info: I handle the payroll and do the bookeeping for a law firm

lender.name: Dan and Katherine
lender.loan_because: I believe in the people I am helping.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a wonderful charter school, KIPP (Knowledge is Power Program), and my wife teaches at YES Prep (Youth Engaged in Service).

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people grow up to better lives and not be so poor
lender.occupational_info: I would describe my work as building a better community and stuff like that

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to support people wanting to improve their lives!

lender.name: A.L. Schwartz
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to those who want to succeed, and to share in the bounty I have in my life.
lender.occupational_info: Theft and fire investigator

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: Because I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a Hairdresser/Belly Dancer

lender.name: lisbeth west
lender.loan_because:
every dollar means new life for a Kiva recipient who does not have my privilege. Today (March 8) is International Women's Day and I am pledging to add Kiva to my charities for 2009-2010. I have lived with a disability all of my life and I have lived in poverty for much of my adult life.
I am now in the position to share my wealth: My pledge to myself was "The first year I make over 10K in one year I must help another person." 2008 was that year.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit poetry and fiction. I am an artist and a photographer and live in the mountains of Colorado. My barnyard has chickens, ducks, geese and a white peacock in it. They remind me every day of how precious life is for all.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Wow- SO many reasons... I guess being fortunate enough to be able to do so, and helping those with a lot of ambition. We are all in this together:)
lender.occupational_info: Caring for patients, working with a very talented, caring medical team.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: It is exciting to help someone help themself.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: KivaMan
lender.loan_because: Start-up capital is the single most-powerful means to improve the lives of people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I try to develop solutions to very human problems and offer them to folks in need with a smile and a firm handshake.

lender.name: Philip
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and a musician.

lender.name: Srini
lender.loan_because: As an individual it's a low risk way of improving GDP and the standard of living of people across nations by effecting substantive change at the bottom of the pyramid - helping the World's working poor.
lender.occupational_info: As a management consultant I advise companies on how to improve their operations so they can grow profitably and be a sustainable enterprise.

lender.name: pastor jack
lender.loan_because: I want to help poor people develop
lender.occupational_info: It requires coming together , helping one another through projects and capacity building for development

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: i believe that boosting entrepeneurs all around the globe will make a better world

lender.name: smarterdecisions
lender.loan_because: My world is full of opportunities, and I like to give others a chance to succeed too.
lender.occupational_info: I listen and advise

lender.name: Atle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help them selves.
lender.occupational_info: I am manager and part owner of several restaurants in the city of Bergen, Norway. We have 120 employees and work hard to give them work. We want to make our city friendly and welcoming.

lender.name: Juergen
lender.loan_because: I used to work in Microfinance for the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the Frankfurt School for 6 years.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professional teacher for Banking and Accounting at a vocational school in Germany.

lender.name: Gene & Laurie
lender.loan_because: We give because we have received.
lender.occupational_info: I give emergency care to people who are sick or injured. My wife is a teacher.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others

lender.name: Beatrice
lender.loan_because: I believe every human being should be give a chance to suceed, if he wants to try.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor and I spend my time helping others

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It's important to have possibilities.
lender.occupational_info: Computer-generated design, like creating magazines or websites, for small businesses and nonprofits.

lender.name: Avery
lender.loan_because: I believe that Jesus calls us to love and help the poor.

lender.name: Peter & Lani
lender.loan_because: I like to help others to support themselves. It is in giving that I receive.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Audio Sales.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I help children with disabilities to learn to be more independent

lender.name: Tim and Jess V
lender.loan_because: Each man should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to help a little.
lender.occupational_info: I work on science books for schoolchildren. The books help them pass tests. My job is to make sure the books are clear and correct.

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: If we all do a little bit for others it will make a huge difference in the world

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe that microlending can change the world.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: It is good to extend the horizons of my sisters and brothers.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to be paid to think and pray and bring mercy to God's children.

lender.name: Loretta
lender.loan_because: its easy, it has little risk and it helps someone to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to those who arent as fortunate and dont have nearly as many resources as many of us in America. It is my duty and my faith to support the global economy.
lender.occupational_info: I provide data storage through hardware and software support for many of the largest companies in the USA.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to micro lend.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build different industrial and laboratory equipment for the oil and gas industry.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's one right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer systems in a French TV channel.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's important to me to do what I can to help others when I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 16 and 17 year old students about world issues.

lender.name: tommy
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to give something back to other people who try hard to improve their lives and their situations.And i hope this way make a different in peoples life.Have a wonderful day :-) tommy
lender.occupational_info: I invest longterm in the stockmarket.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I love that my money is being used to help hard-working people make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to kids ages 14-18.

lender.name: Arne
lender.loan_because: I can give others a chance to prove themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop databases and desktop applications.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and a graduate student.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: A man's life does not consist in the abundance of his possessions.

lender.name: Angie
lender.occupational_info: I manage the monitoring and evaluation activities of the C-SAFE Zimbabwe consortium food aid program between CARE, CRS and WVI.
